name: SquareOne 🔲
description:
Submission for WoWie Jam 3.0 "Failure is Progress".

Failure is a part of each progress and sometimes all we need to do is get back to SquareOne and readjust.

This game was build in an afternoon as one of my first attempts at making games, feedback is super welcome!

Build using ct.js.

You can also navigate using arrow keys.

Background Music by ShortRecord on FreeSound: https://freesound.org/people/ShortRecord/sounds/544416/
